runs.comm: pushed off the front foot on the off side
wham! Santner pitches short and Hafeez goes back and heaves over wide long on, towards the shorter side of the ground
defended back to the bowler
pushed on the off side with soft hands
fired down leg side, Hafeez misses the glance
played to mid on off the front foot
shot! That's the long boundary but the timing is great. Hafeez steps out of his crease and drills the ball hard through extra cover
good length angling across the right-hander from over the wicket, played off the front foot towards mid off
short of a length angling across the right-hander, Shehzad stays back and steers to third man
a full ball outside off, Hafeez reaches away from his body to squirt the ball through point but he doesn't find the gap
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot towards point, where the fielder dives on the edge of the circle and saves the four. The boundary behind him is really short
strays on to the hips, maybe Anderson was worried about the short off side boundaries? Hafeez glances towards fine leg where Milne chases and saves the boundary. That came off his thigh
full and wide outside off, Hafeez reaches for it but is beaten, Anderson starts well
good length outside off, Shehzad pushed at it but checked his shot and got a thick edge towards third man
good length angling into the right-hander at 145 kph, Hafeez dabs the ball with soft hands towards midwicket and runs
good length outside off, Shehzad stays back and defends on the off side
shot! A length ball coming into the right-hander, Shehzad presses forward and punches through the line with a high elbow, driving the ball to mid-on's left and to the boundary
quick single taken after mis-timing the drive to mid off, that was a full ball outside off from Milne
a full ball on the pads, clipped to the man at deep square leg
a full ball, Hafeez clears his front foot and mows the ball to the wide long on boundary
beaten outside off stump, Hafeez pushed forward at a good length ball seaming away from middle and off and missed it
short of a length with a bit of extra bounce outside off, Hafeez aims for the short boundary at point but makes no contact, it was a slightly slower ball and it sprung off the pitch

that's in the air and Williamson comes sprinting around from mid off and dives full length but can't reach the ball, Hafeez was looking to hit big on the leg side but ended up slicing it over the bowler's head
short ball, pulled to Guptill at deep square leg

a much easier chance for Williamson at mid-off this time and he takes it, Shehzad slogged across the line at a good length ball, he was hitting against the angle across him from over the wicket as well, he ended up slicing it straight to mid-off.
a slower ball on a good length on off stump, Hafeez stays in his crease and defends on the off side
defended off the back foot on the off side, pulled the length back a little
banged in short and fast, Hafeez moves forward and across to scoop over fine leg but was beaten, that was rapid from McClenaghan
good length on off, Hafeez has no room to work with, defends on the off side
played off the back foot towards third man, first run off the over
pushed off the front foot towards point
stays back to a short of a length ball and cuts firmly to point where Santner dives to his right and takes pace off the ball, it's the short boundary behind him so he did well
good length and angling away from the right-hander, close to off stump, Maqsood tries to drive on the up but is beaten
Santner dives to his left this time and makes a clean save, stopping Maqsood's back-foot steer
defended from the crease close on the off side, behind point, Ronchi runs across to field
full and very wide outside off, going to have to bowl that again

slashes hard at a length ball that slants across him and the ball flies down to third man off the top edge, Elliott races to his left and dives to save the boundary, gets the throw away to Ronchi quickly and Maqsood has to hurry and dive to make it back
short of a length and straight, defended on the back foot

and Hafeez has failed to clear the short boundary! It's a short ball, Hafeez went back and pulled. He didn't get the height or the distance on it and Astle caught the flat catch at deep midwicket. How do you not clear a 52 metre boundary! He rolled his wrists a bit, maybe that's why Hafeez did not get the elevation on the shot.
driven to long off for a single, Santner bowled from around the wicket
defended on the off side on the front foot
bowled slowly on a good length on middle, defended on the front foot
bowled flatter and faster on middle, played off the back foot towards point
driven fluently off the front foot, extra cover moves quickly to his right and dives to cut it off
pushed off the front foot through midwicket, he bowled that flat on the pads, staying away from that off side
nice flight and drift on middle stump, spins away from the right-hander, pushed off the front foot against the turn through midwicket
the wrong one goes wrong, it's too short, Maqsood goes back and hammers the pull over deep midwicket, it's the longer boundary but it isn't all that long
played off the back foot behind point
too short once again, Maqsood goes back and pulls hard, picking out the gap at cow corner
flat and a bit short outside off, cut hard off the back foot to deep point
good length on a wicket to wicket line, stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
angles into the right-hander from around the wicket, the batsman tries to turn the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye, Pakistan have finally got to 50
says back to a length ball and steers the ball to third man
tries to pull off the back foot but the length isn't short enough and he is cramped for room by the line, gets an inside edge on to the body and on the off side
goes back and towards leg and slashes at a short ball, ends up getting a top edge that falls safely over the head of the fielder running back from cover
steered to third man off the back foot
is he bowling slow legcutters? The batsman went back and cut to deep point.
played off the back foot on the leg side
banged in short with the keeper standing up, Maqsood is beaten on the pull and Ronchi manages to get some glove on it, tough take for the keeper
played through mid on for a single
stays back and hits the ball along the ground to long off
good length on a wicket to wicket line, worked off the pads through midwicket
short ball at pace from Milne outside off, from over the wicket, Maqsood swipes at it but is very late on the shot and is beaten
edged and four! Malik tries to punch through cover but gets a thick outside edge that sends the ball racing past the keeper, that was short of a length and fast from Milne
played off the back foot but can't beat point
that was measured at 153 kph, Malik hit it hard to cover point
banged in short, really fast stuff from Milne this, Maqsood ducks but the ball was well over his head
cut from the crease but once again he does not find the gap at point, Malik hitting the fielders regularly
backs away and swipes at the good length ball, trying to hit through the off side, he ends up dragging the ball towards the non-striker ... he has struggled to time the ball today
Maqsood's struggle is over, he tries to back away and slam the ball over the off side, he gets a top edge, hitting it high in the air towards long off, where Santner back pedals and takes the catch
Malik picks the gap between short third man and backward point, he goes back and cuts the slower ball late and just wide of the fielder diving to his left at point
pushed off the front foot to long on

nudged off the front foot just past the non-striker, a bit of a mix up between the batsmen but they make it comfortably in the end, the non striker was waiting to see if the ball got far enough away from the bowlerw
worked through midwicket for a single
pushed through midwicket for another single

nudged off the front foot towards midwicket, it looks like an easy single until Santner gets to the ball at crazy speed, slides, picks up and fires the throw to the bowler's end. Would have been out with a direct hit
worked off the back foot on the leg side
tossed up into the right-hander, Akmal moves forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts the slower ball high and far over the short boundary at deep midwicket
too short this time, Akmal just rocks back and pulls the flat ball over deep square leg, can't bowl that length with the short boundary on the leg side
overcompensates by bowling really wide outside off, the batsman lets it go
played along the ground through midwicket
cut off the back foot but can't beat point
nudged off the front foot to Guptill at deep midwicket
not that short and not that wide outside off, but Malik is so good behind point, he waits on the back foot and cuts hard and late, beating backward point to his left
tries to work the ball on the leg side but the pace is so slow that he played too early, the ball rolls along the pitch to the bowler off the leading edge
this time there's width outside off, Malik goes back and frees his arms, cutting the ball hard behind point to bring up the 100
short ball at the body, Malik pulls to Guptill at deep square leg
nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
full and wide outside off, angling away from the right-hander, Akmal leans forward and across to drive through cover but edges it past the keeper to the third man boundary, he went hard at that ball
another really wide ball outside off, Akmal tries to chase it but it is too far away, Anderson staying away from the short leg side boudnary
slashes at the ball and edges a good length ball towards third man
tries to drive the ball powerfully over the off side but gets an inside edge that dribbles towards midwicket
a low full toss wide outside off, driven along the ground to deep cover
a length ball outside off, Malik is ready and waiting though, clearing his front foot and slamming the pull along the ground to the cow corner boundary
Anderson is bowling really full and really wide to prevent the batsmen from exploiting the short leg side boundary, he's too wide outside off this time
tries to drive a good length ball on the off side but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
the slower ball on a good length on middle and leg, staying away from the off side, which is the short boundary. Played off the pads through square leg
slower ball again on a wicket to wicket line, the pull is mis-timed through midwicket
tries to heave a good length slower ball over the leg side but mis-times it towards long on, that pitched inside the circle
short ball, dragged down with the pull towards deep midwicket

that's a huge blow! High and far over the deep midwicket boundary, it's the long boundary and that's out of the ground. Akmal gets on the front foot to a slower and full ball and heaves across the line with a lot of power. That hit was measured at 103 metres.
played back to the bowler, Elliott moves quickly to his right to field
a slower fullish ball on the pads, Malik flicks but can't find the gap at deep square leg, he should have put that away
full and wide outside off, Akmal moves towards the off and tries to heave to the shorter leg-side boundary but is beaten
short of a length outside off, Akmal cuts off the back foot and bottom edges the slower ball to third man
that's too wide outside off, clearly trying to not give Malik chances to hit on the leg side
the bouncer outside off, rather wide bouncer, Malik chases and misses
bowled him! Malik inside edges a blockhole delivery from outside off on to his middle stump. It was the slower ball as well. Malik was trying to steer to third man.
a high full toss around off stump, Afridi plays an uncharacteristically tame steer towards point, terrific spell from Mitch today
and Afridi clears his front foot and slaps the short of a length ball from outside off stump over the deep cover boundary

and he's been caught this time! Afridi tries to clear the off side - backing away outside leg and heaving - but mis-times the good length ball. Milne had cramped him for room by following him. Williamson back pedals from mid-off and takes the catch on the move
short ball and Akmal pulls off the back foot behind square
short of a length just outside off, Wasim backs away and cuts the ball to deep backward point
backs away and heaves at a short ball and misses
shot! Full and wide outside off, it's the long boundary on that side but Wasim gets under it and carves the ball high and far over the cover boundary
a low full toss outside off, Akmal lunges forward, stays low, gets under it and drives the ball over cover and to the boundary
he's ruining McClenaghan's figures here! Clears his front foot and mows the full ball over the deep midwicket boundary, that's the short side as well
full toss and he's drilled the drive so hard towards long off, Guptill runs and dives to his right but can't save the four
he's mis-timed the pull but it falls short of deep midwicket! He's got to his fifty off 22 balls, so well played!

short ball from around the wicket, Wasim swivels and hooks, sending the ball swirling towards long leg off the top edge. Adam Milne is one of the finest catchers I have seen for a fast bowler, he moves to his left and though it's a tough catch to judge he manages to get under it and take it while tumbling to the turf
in the blockhole outside off, Akmal is beaten, McClenaghan came back well after the first three balls went for boundaries
backs away outside leg, the bowler follows him with a full ball, driven to long on for a single
a full ball just outside off stump, that was there to be hit but Akmal cleared his front foot and swung a bit too hard, lost his shape a bit
in the blockhole, Akmal jams his bat down on it and the ball thuds into the pitch and bounces over Milne, mid-off runs to his right to field, top final over from Milne so far

they have tried to steal a bye but Sarfraz is run out! Milne fired in a bouncer, and Sarfraz was beaten on the swipe. Akmal wanted the strike so he ran. Ronchi underarms the ball but misses at the striker's end, Milne collects the ball mid-pitch, turns and nails the stumps at the non-striker's end
and Akmal taking the strike has paid off! He clears his front leg and carves a full ball outside off towards deep cover, one-bounce four
a low full toss, hit to square leg, just the single to finish the innings
